parameters.query: SELECT q.*, COALESCE(json_agg(o.*) FILTER (WHERE o.id IS NOT NULL), '[]') as options FROM atomic_questions q LEFT JOIN parametric_question_options o ON q.id = o.original_question_id WHERE q.id = $1 GROUP BY q.id

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ contents: [{ parts: [{ text: $json.gemini_prompt }] }], generationConfig: { temperature: 0.8, maxOutputTokens: 8192 } }) }}

parameters.query: INSERT INTO generated_variants (id, original_question_id, variant_number, question_text, options, explanation, transformation_log, quality_score) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), $1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7) RETURNING id
UPDATE atomic_questions SET generation_count = COALESCE(generation_count, 0) + $1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $2
